generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with cobblestone texture, marked with red and white lines, and vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, with pedestrians walking on it, and on the right side near the buildings.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- wall: A long, plain concrete wall is visible on the left side of the street, adjacent to the sidewalk.
- fence: A metal fence is visible on the right side of the street, near the building with graffiti.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one with a traffic sign on the left side of the street and others along the road.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the left side of the street, mounted on a pole.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the street, including tall trees on the left and right sides and smaller bushes near the sidewalk.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible on the right side of the street, near the sidewalk.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: Two people are visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the street.
- car: Multiple cars are visible parked along the street, including a black car in the center of the image.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the right side of the street, near the fence.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
